name: Speedy Slimes
description:
Speedy Slimes is a game where you go around shooting slimes. The goal is to get as high of a score as possible.

Red Slimes: are the slowest slimes and the easiest to kill

Blue Slimes: are a little bit faster than red slimes but are still easy to kill.

Yellow Slimes: the yellow slimes are the fastest slimes in the game and are very hard to kill.

I am only 13 years old and this is my first Game Jam. I know the game isn't perfect, but I hope I can improve my programming skills in the coming years.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
